duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a business development plan to achieve sales growth targets.
Build strong working relationships with all sales channels within the assigned territory.
Coordinate and conduct product training for all sales channels.
Analyze and identify market trends, providing feedback to support teams.
Manage sales channel performance to optimize the company's position in the assigned territory.
Maintain a can-do attitude with a tremendous drive to deliver results consistently.
Promote engineered rotating equipment with technical capability in the municipal market.
Demonstrate strong communication and presentation skills.
Maintain excellent relationship and people skills.
Desire to travel a minimum of 70% of the time to be in front of customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in engineering or a similar technical degree (Master's preferred)
